name: wai-globe-visualization
description: Real-time 3D globe visualization of the W.AI distributed compute network.

scripts.css:purge: purgecss --css assets/css/style-temp.css --content '*.html' --safelist w-mod-js w-mod-touch w-form-done w-form-fail --output assets/css/
scripts.css:build: npm run css:clean && npm run css:purge && npm run css:rename

author: W.AI
